title: Product Card With Title And Price

versions.prompt: Create a simple product card with Flowbite Svelte showing a product with title, description and price
versions.code:
import type { Meta, StoryObj } from '@storybook/svelte'; import Card from 'flowbite-svelte/dist/card/Card.svelte'; import Button from 'flowbite-svelte/dist/buttons/Button.svelte'; import Badge from 'flowbite-svelte/dist/badge/Badge.svelte'; const meta: Meta = { title: 'Generated/Product Card', component: Card, tags: ['autodocs'], parameters: { layout: 'centered' }, }; export default meta; type Story = StoryObj; export const Default: Story = { render: () => ({ Component: Card, props: {}, slot: `
Wireless Headphones

Premium noise-cancelling wireless headphones with superior sound quality and long-lasting battery life. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

$199.99
`, }), }; export const WithButton: Story = { render: () => ({ Component: Card, props: {}, slot: `
Smart Watch Pro

Track your fitness goals with this advanced smartwatch featuring heart rate monitoring, GPS, and water resistance.

$299.99
`, }), }; export const WithBadge: Story = { render: () => ({ Component: Card, props: {}, slot: `
Sale
Ultra Performance Laptop

High-performance laptop with the latest processor, stunning display, and all-day battery life for professionals on the go.

$1,499.99 $1,299.99
`, }), };
